full_text: Leslie Mann  is an American actress and comedian best known for her roles in comedic films such as The Cable Guy , George of the Jungle , The 40-Year-Old Virgin , Knocked Up , 17 Again , Funny People , Rio , The Change-Up , This Is 40  and The Other Woman , many of which are collaborations with her husband, Judd Apatow. In 2012, Elle named her "Hollywood's queen of comedy".
title: Leslie Mann
